definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Blush can be poured through a hidden semi-transparent cover, very fitting skin.
sentences.chinese: 腮紅可透過隱藏的半透明罩倒出，極度貼合肌膚。

sentences.english: He seems to be grief-stricken due to the loss of a friend.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來極度憂傷是因爲失去了一個朋友。

sentences.english: Please try, also, not to go totally freaking insane in the process.
sentences.chinese: 請嘗試，還有，不要在這個過程中保持極度興奮瘋狂。

sentences.english: "The Arabian Nights" is a very interesting story-book.
sentences.chinese: “一千零一夜”“是一本極度風趣的故事書。

sentences.english: Hearing this, Wilbur threw himself down in an agony of pain and sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這話，威爾伯癱坐下來，極度痛苦和悲傷。

sentences.english: The news enfevered the whole class.
sentences.chinese: 這消息令全班同學極度興奮。

sentences.english: Moreover, the economy was prone to slumps and episodes of hyperinflation.
sentences.chinese: 而且，當時的巴西經濟很可能出現蕭條或是極度通脹。

sentences.english: He looks into the void, feeling empty.
sentences.chinese: 他眼望着虛無，感到極度空虛。

sentences.english: Charm is the ultimate weapon, the supreme seduction, against which there are few defenses.
sentences.chinese: 魅力是終極武器，是極度誘惑，並且它天下無敵。

sentences.english: No one can work in such blisteringly harsh weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人可以在這種極度惡劣的氣候中工作。

sentences.english: Yes, he is a gigantic egotistical overrated artist.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，他是一個極度自負的卻被高估的演員。

sentences.english: Barefaced attitude is exceeding and ambiguous fetching illusion is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 露骨的姿態極度曖昧引人幻想無限。

sentences.english: It sounds like this dog was traumatized from the experience of extreme stress and fear, " Saul said.
sentences.chinese: 聽上去這隻狗的創傷是由於經歷了極度壓力和恐懼。

sentences.english: I was desperate for his attention.
sentences.chinese: 我極度渴望得到他的關注。

sentences.english: The Bush administration was out of gas, and the public was starved for leadership.
sentences.chinese: 布什政府已經黔驢技窮，公衆極度渴望強有力的領導。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
